articles.title: Unexpected link between most common cancer drivers may yield more effective drugs - EurekAlert
articles.description: A UW–Madison research team has discovered a direct link between cellular pathways that make promising targets for new cancer treatments.
articles.content: image: Outlined in green, this nucleus of a cancerous cell contains DNA in blue and red blobs marking the cells p53 protein binding with parts of the Atk cellular signaling pathway, a partnership tha… [+5254 chars]
